lead_paragraph: Blake Griffin of the Los Angeles Clippers will have surgery on Tuesday to clean out his right knee, and is expected to miss three to six weeks.

headline.print_headline: Clippers Say Blake Griffin to Have Surgery, Miss 3-6 Weeks
headline.main: Clippers Say Blake Griffin to Have Surgery, Miss 3-6 Weeks

snippet: Blake Griffin of the Los Angeles Clippers will have surgery on Tuesday to clean out his right knee, and is expected to miss three to six weeks....
